title: Finding a Trend Between Years
text: Find the trend between the populations rom 2010 and 2012 based on how much their population dropped. How much does the population drop per year? (This is the slope of the equation.)

title: Using an Equation to Represent Relationships
text: Create an equation representing the relationship between population and the years.

title: Verifying the Equation
text: What is the equation that represents the town's population, with y being population and x being number of years since 2010?

title: Subsituting a Value into the Trend Equation
text: Insert 0 as y in the equation to solve for x, the number of years passed when the population reaches 0.
